mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_filedetail (atch_file_id, file_sn, ori_name, save_name, save_path, file_size) VALUES (#{atch_file_id},#{file_sn},#{ori_name},#{save_name},#{save_path},#{file_size})
mapper.select: SELECT b.num, f.file_key f.ori_name, f.save_name, f.save_path, ROUND(file_size/1024,1) AS file_size FROM b_files as f INNER JOIN b_board as b ON (f.file_key = b.file_key) WHERE b.num = #{num} AND del_chk = 'N'
SELECT m.atch_file_id, f.file_sn, f.ori_name FROM b_filedetail as f INNER JOIN b_filemaster as m ON (f.atch_file_id = m.atch_file_id) WHERE m.atch_file_id = #{atch_file_id}
